    Artemisinin-Derived Dimers: Potent Antimalarial and Anticancer Agents

    • Tony Fröhlich
      • , 
    • Aysun Çapcı Karagöz
      • , 
    • Christoph Reiter
      • , and 
    • Svetlana B. Tsogoeva*
    View Author Information
    Department of Chemistry and Pharmacy, Organic Chemistry Chair I and Interdisciplinary Center for Molecular Materials (ICMM), University of Erlangen-Nürnberg, Henkestrasse 42, 91054 Erlangen, Germany
    *E-mail: [email protected]; Tel.: (+49)-(0)9131-85-22541.
    Cite this: J. Med. Chem. 2016, 59, 16, 7360–7388
    Publication Date (Web):March 24, 2016

    Publication History

    • Received6 September 2015
    • Published online6 April 2016
    • Published inissue 25 August 2016
    https://doi.org/10.1021/acs.jmedchem.5b01380
    Copyright © 2016 American Chemical Society

    SUBJECTS:
